summaries.brief_summary: Unboxed arrays, flambda2 reaper enhancements, AVX2 SIMD support, and abstract kinds foundation work progressing
summaries.new_features_summary: Immutable unboxed product arrays, GC-ignorable arrays, AVX2 gather intrinsics, profiling output control, no-locs flag
summaries.new_features:
- **Immutable arrays of unboxed products** enable creation of iarrays containing unboxed product types, expanding support for layout-polymorphic immutable collections ([#5026](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5026))
- **Arrays of GC-ignorable values** introduce `Pgcignorableaddrarray` kind for arrays containing pointers that do not need GC scanning, improving memory efficiency ([#4963](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4963))
- **AVX2 gather intrinsics** add support for vectorized memory gather operations with semi-new addressing mode `reg + vec[..] * scale + displ`, enabling efficient scattered memory access patterns ([#5040](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5040))
- **Profiling output control** via new `-dprofile-output <filename>` flag allows redirecting profiling data to specific files instead of stdout ([#5074](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5074))
- **Debug metrics file control** through `-ddwarf-metrics-output-file` flag enables custom output location for DWARF debug metrics ([#5074](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5074))
- **No-locs compiler flag** adds `-no-locs` option for suppressing location information in output, useful for deterministic test outputs ([#5072](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5072))
- **Domain.self_index portability** annotation correctly marks `Domain.self_index` as portable in stdlib signature ([#5101](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5101))
- **Improved artifact cleanup** provides finer control over compiler artifact generation and removal, fixing cases where `-stop-after` incorrectly deleted unrelated files ([#5085](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5085))
- **Quote printing fixes** resolve bugs in printing character literals, string literals, quoted strings, and labelled function parameters under quotations ([#5079](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5079))
- **Slambda splices in Lambda** add support for embedding Slambda code within Lambda expressions for metaprogramming ([#5023](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5023))
- **Ast_mapper quote support** fixes AST mapper to correctly handle quotes and splices in parse tree transformations ([#5077](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5077))
- **GADT with-bounds re-enabled** restores support for with-bounds constraints on GADT type parameters after previous restrictions ([#5046](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5046))
- **Loose staticity checking** relaxes overly strict mode checks for static values in certain contexts ([#5075](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5075))
- **Mode error prioritization** ensures application type errors are reported before mode errors for better error message clarity ([#5073](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5073))
summaries.activity_summary: Abstract kinds foundation (2 large PRs under review), name mangling series (5 PRs), nullability/separability axis work continuing
summaries.activity:
- **Abstract kinds implementation** proceeding through multi-PR series with [#5070](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5070) refactoring to eliminate cyclic dependencies (1858 additions, 1498 deletions across 13 files) and [#5071](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5071) adding basic abstract kinds and kind aliases (3241 additions, 1033 deletions, 103 files) both opened and under active review by [Liam Stevenson](https://github.com/liam923) and [Richard Eisenberg](https://github.com/goldfirere)
- **Name mangling overhaul** advancing with five related PRs from [Tim McGilchrist](https://github.com/tmcgilchrist): reversible name mangling scheme ([#5099](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5099)), ocamlfilt demangler implementation ([#5100](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5100)), configuration options ([#5097](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5097)), improved debug tracking ([#5098](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5098)), and debug info gathering ([#5096](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5096))
- **Nullability and separability work** continuing with [Zack Eisbach](https://github.com/zackbach) opening [#5095](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5095) adding `non_pointer64` on separability axis, [#5086](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5086) making nullability scannable, and [#5104](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5104) using scannable axes to influence Lambda translation
- **Reaper enhancements** merged with [#5081](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5081) adding auto mode for direct call preservation and [#5043](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5043) implementing type rewriting in the reaper by [Nathanaëlle Courant](https://github.com/Ekdohibs)
- **Flambda2 indirect calls** improved through [#4809](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4809) adding set of possible code_ids to `Indirect_known_arity` call kind, enabling better optimization of indirect calls with known arity by [Nathanaëlle Courant](https://github.com/Ekdohibs)
- **Backend register allocation** refactored with [#4888](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4888) making `Reg.t` private by [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) in preparation for register aliases with accurate types
- **Quotation improvements** progressing with [Jakub Bachurski](https://github.com/jbachurski) working on disambiguation ([#5094](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5094)), elaboration framework ([#5090](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5090)), test organization ([#5089](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5089)), and annotation fixes ([#5083](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5083))
- **Datalog provenance** enhanced by [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) with [#5091](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5091) allowing dynamic enabling at rule evaluation time rather than module load time
- **Unboxed arrays** expanded with [James Rayman](https://github.com/jra4) continuing work on [#4643](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4643) for int8#, int16#, and int# arrays (3677 additions, 70 files)
- **Register allocation affinity** under development in [#5059](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5059) by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) implementing basic affinity support for all three allocators
- **Flambda2 inlining** refined through [#5093](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5093) by [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) considering `value` arguments non-useful for speculative inlining decisions
- **CFG dataflow** refactored in [#5045](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5045) by [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) unifying forward and backward analysis types
- **Documentation efforts** advancing with [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) creating encyclopædia of flambda2 optimizations in [#5082](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5082)
- **Local mode pointers** being debugged in [#5087](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5087) by [Ryan Tjoa](https://github.com/rtjoa) fixing segfault with `%unsafe_set_ptr` and NULL base
- **Shapes format** under consideration in [#5103](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5103) by [Simon Spies](https://github.com/spiessimon) for flipping default format
- **ASAN runtime** optimization proposed in [#5102](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5102) by [Kevin Svetlitski](https://github.com/Svetlitski) to disable instrumentation in compiler's own runtime, reducing compilation overhead from 40-45% to 20-25%
summaries.trends_summary: Type system advancement through layouts/jkinds/modes, unboxed types expansion, flambda2 optimization maturation, tooling improvements
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Abstract kinds infrastructure** representing fundamental type system evolution with extensive refactoring to support kind-level abstraction and eliminate circular dependencies between `jkind.ml` and `env.ml` ([#5070](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5070), [#5071](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5071))
- **Unboxed and specialized array types** expanding with immutable product arrays ([#5026](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5026)), GC-ignorable arrays ([#4963](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4963)), and int arrays ([#4643](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4643)) showing systematic work on layout-polymorphic data structures
- **Flambda2 reaper maturation** through type rewriting ([#5043](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5043)), improved call tracking ([#4809](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4809), [#5081](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5081)), and inlining heuristic refinements ([#5093](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5093))
- **Metaprogramming capabilities** advancing with quotation disambiguation ([#5094](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5094)), Slambda splices ([#5023](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5023)), and improved quote printing ([#5079](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5079))
- **Debug and tooling improvements** including name mangling redesign ([#5097](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5097), [#5098](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5098), [#5099](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5099), [#5100](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5100)), profiling output control ([#5074](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5074)), and ASAN optimization ([#5102](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5102))
- **Jkind axis refinements** with nullability becoming scannable ([#5086](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5086)) and `non_pointer64` addition to separability ([#5095](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5095)) continuing evolution of layout representation
- **SIMD support expansion** demonstrated by AVX2 gather intrinsics ([#5040](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5040)) showing ongoing backend enhancement for vectorization
- **Mode system refinements** through loose staticity checking ([#5075](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5075)), GADT with-bounds ([#5046](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5046)), and error prioritization ([#5073](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5073))
summaries.contributors_summary: 18 contributors with major work from Ekdohibs, gretay-js, jbachurski, zackbach, tmcgilchrist, bclement-ocp on type systems and optimization
summaries.contributors:
- [@polytypic](https://github.com/polytypic) (Vesa Karvonen) fixed `Domain.self_index` portability annotation in stdlib ([#5101](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5101))
- [Nathanaëlle Courant](https://github.com/Ekdohibs) merged reaper auto mode for direct call preservation ([#5081](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5081)), type rewriting in reaper ([#5043](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5043)), and indirect call code_ids tracking ([#4809](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4809))
- [@riaqn](https://github.com/riaqn) contributed finer artifact generation and removal control ([#5085](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5085))
- [@TheNumbat](https://github.com/TheNumbat) implemented AVX2 gather intrinsics with extensive review discussion ([#5040](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5040))
- [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) made `Reg.t` private in backend ([#4888](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4888)), formatted reg files ([#5084](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5084)), and is refactoring CFG dataflow ([#5045](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5045))
- [@bclement-ocp](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) enabled datalog provenance at rule evaluation ([#5091](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5091)), provided review on reaper and inlining work, and is documenting flambda2 optimizations ([#5082](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5082)) and refining inlining decisions ([#5093](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5093))
- [@jbachurski](https://github.com/jbachurski) organized quotation test structure ([#5089](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5089)), fixed quote printing ([#5079](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5079)), and is working on quotation disambiguation ([#5094](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5094)), elaboration ([#5090](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5090)), and let rec annotations ([#5083](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5083))
- [@spiessimon](https://github.com/spiessimon) improved profiling and debug metrics collection ([#5074](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5074)), provided extensive review on AVX2 gather work, and opened shapes format PR ([#5103](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5103))
- [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) merged immutable unboxed product arrays ([#5026](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5026)) and GC-ignorable arrays ([#4963](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4963))
- [@lpw25](https://github.com/lpw25) merged Slambda splices ([#5023](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5023)), Ast_mapper fixes ([#5077](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5077)), GADT with-bounds ([#5046](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5046)), no-locs flag ([#5072](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5072)), loose staticity checking ([#5075](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5075)), transl_value_decl refactoring ([#5060](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5060)), mode error prioritization ([#5073](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5073)), and flambda2 type rewriting interface ([#5050](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5050))
- [@tmcgilchrist](https://github.com/tmcgilchrist) opened five PRs for name mangling redesign including reversible scheme ([#5099](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5099)), ocamlfilt demangler ([#5100](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5100)), configuration ([#5097](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5097)), and debug tracking improvements ([#5098](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5098), [#5096](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5096))
- [@zackbach](https://github.com/zackbach) opened three PRs on jkind axes including non_pointer64 separability ([#5095](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5095)), nullability scannable axis ([#5086](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5086)), and scannable axes influence on Lambda ([#5104](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5104))
- [@ccasin](https://github.com/ccasin) opened two abstract kinds PRs with refactoring ([#5070](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5070)) and basic implementation ([#5071](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5071)), both under extensive review
- [@rtjoa](https://github.com/rtjoa) opened draft PR fixing local unsafe_ptr_set with NULL base ([#5087](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5087))
- [@Svetlitski](https://github.com/Svetlitski) proposed ASAN runtime optimization ([#5102](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5102))
- [@liam923](https://github.com/liam923) provided detailed review on abstract kinds PRs with numerous technical comments
- [@goldfirere](https://github.com/goldfirere) reviewed abstract kinds work and participated in design discussions
- [@jra4](https://github.com/jra4) continuing work on untagged int arrays ([#4643](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4643))
- [@xclerc](https://github.com/xclerc) working on register allocation affinity ([#5059](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5059))

summaries.brief_summary: Backend optimization surge with 10 x86 peephole PRs, type system improvements, and new intrinsics support
summaries.new_features_summary: Manifest file support, 128-bit intrinsics, BMI/BMI2 ops, jkind normalization optimization, unboxed module elements
summaries.new_features:
- **Manifest file support** for compiler include paths via `-I-manifest` and `-H-manifest` flags, allowing specification of available files directly rather than entire directories ([#4986](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4986))
- **128-bit integer arithmetic intrinsics** including `add_int128`, `sub_int128`, `mul_int64` (signed/unsigned), compiling to efficient add/adc, sub/sbb, and imul/mul instructions ([#5025](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5025))
- **BMI/BMI2 intrinsics implementation** with support for POPCNT, LZCNT (now separate from BMI), and multiple return registers in simdgen ([#5065](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5065))
- **Jkind normalization fuel optimization** - runs out of fuel only once per jkind, reusing fuel cache when normalizing with additional types ([#5047](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5047), [#5009](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5009))
- **Unboxed elements at module top-level** now allowed after fixing cross-module inlining behavior ([#5064](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5064))
- **Skip mode hints** added in several missing locations to improve mode error diagnostics ([#5053](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5053))
- **Chamelon minimization** can now be stopped with Ctrl-C by replacing `Sys.command` with Unix module calls ([#5061](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5061))
- **Race condition fix** for `-dump-dir` flag when used with nonexistent paths in parallel builds ([#5010](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5010))
- **Classic mode approximations** now track kinds for non-Value variables, enabling proper mixed module block inlining ([#5058](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5058))
- **Repository cleanup** - boot directory removed, saving 5% of source repo size ([#5067](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5067)); .vscode directory now ignored ([#4186](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4186))
- **Debugging improvements** with new tests for C/OCaml interaction including runtime breakpoints and stack traces ([#5062](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5062))
- **IRC register allocator refactoring** - `irc_work_list` moved from instruction field to IRC state table ([#4594](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4594))
summaries.activity_summary: 26 new PRs opened including abstract kinds preparation, typed ARM64 DSL, and separability axis work; backend optimization continues
summaries.activity:
- **New PRs opened** this week include abstract kinds preparation by [Chris Casinghino](https://github.com/ccasin) ([#5070](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5070)), typed ARM64 DSL by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) ([#5037](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5037)), separability axis scannable conversion by [Zack Eisbach](https://github.com/zackbach) ([#5031](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5031)), register allocation affinity support by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) ([#5059](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5059)), and x86 peephole optimizations continuation ([#5063](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5063))
- **Backend optimization surge** led by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) with 10 merged PRs implementing x86 peephole rules for redundant comparison removal ([#5028](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5028)), MOV-to-LEA rewriting ([#5018](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5018)), MOV-to-XCHG optimization ([#5016](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5016)), useless move deletion ([#4985](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4985)), MOV chain optimization ([#4977](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4977)), infrastructure refactoring ([#5032](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5032), [#4975](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4975)), CI testing ([#4976](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4976)), and IRC refactoring ([#4594](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4594))
- **Type system evolution** with [Liam Stevenson](https://github.com/liam923) optimizing jkind normalization fuel ([#5047](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5047), [#5009](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5009)) and environment fold operations ([#5066](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5066)), [James Rayman](https://github.com/jra4) re-enabling unboxed module elements ([#5064](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5064)), [Zesen Qian](https://github.com/riaqn) adding staticity checking ([#5054](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5054)) and mode hints ([#5053](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5053)), and [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) fixing classic mode approximations ([#5058](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5058))
- **Intrinsics expansion** by [Max Slater](https://github.com/TheNumbat) adding 128-bit integer operations ([#5025](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5025)) and BMI/BMI2 support ([#5065](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5065))
- **Flambda2 cleanup** with [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) removing 3-year-old disabled code age relation join ([#5051](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5051)) and improving chamelon ([#5061](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5061)), [Nathanaëlle Courant](https://github.com/Ekdohibs) refactoring reaper code ([#5049](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5049), [#5038](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5038))
- **Ongoing work** includes reaper type rewriting ([#5043](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5043)), GADT with-bounds re-enablement ([#5046](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5046)), typed ARM64 DSL ([#5037](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5037)), flambda2 type interface ([#5050](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5050)), debugging improvements by [Simon Spies](https://github.com/spiessimon) ([#4916](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4916), [#4961](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4961), [#4928](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4928)), name mangling scheme by [Tim McGilchrist](https://github.com/tmcgilchrist) ([#4850](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4850)), and untagged int arrays by [James Rayman](https://github.com/jra4) ([#4779](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4779), [#4643](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4643), [#4936](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4936))
- **Developer tooling improvements** including manifest files by [Andrei Odintsov](https://github.com/Forestryks) ([#4986](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4986)), magic number bump by [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) ([#5048](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5048)), boot directory removal by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#5067](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5067)), test fix by [Vesa Karvonen](https://github.com/polytypic) ([#5042](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5042)), and documentation typo fix by [BuzzY_](https://github.com/BuzzYbis) ([#5069](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5069))
summaries.trends_summary: Backend optimization focus, type system evolution, platform support expansion, and technical debt reduction
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Backend optimization momentum** with systematic x86 peephole work establishing patterns for instruction-level optimization including flag liveness analysis, pseudo-liveness tracking, and comprehensive CI testing
- **Type system maturation** through jkind normalization improvements, mode system refinements, and preparation for abstract kinds feature
- **Intrinsics library expansion** targeting both x86 (BMI/BMI2) and ARM64 platforms with focus on efficient compilation of low-level operations
- **Flambda2 consolidation** removing long-disabled features and refactoring for clarity while preparing for type rewriting capabilities
- **Developer experience focus** through repository cleanup (boot directory removal), tooling improvements (manifest files), and build system fixes
- **Cross-module optimization** work addressing mixed module blocks and classic mode approximation issues to improve inlining behavior
- **Platform parity efforts** with ongoing ARM64 DSL work and intrinsics additions to match x86 capabilities
summaries.contributors_summary: 18 contributors active with Xavier Clerc leading backend optimization, multiple developers advancing type system features
summaries.contributors:
- [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) implemented extensive x86 backend optimizations including peephole rules for redundant instructions ([#5028](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5028), [#5018](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5018), [#5016](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5016), [#4985](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4985), [#4977](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4977), [#5032](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5032), [#4975](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4975), [#4976](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4976)), IRC allocator refactoring ([#4594](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4594)), and opened register allocation affinity work ([#5059](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5059), [#5063](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5063), [#5033](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5033))
- [Liam Stevenson](https://github.com/liam923) optimized jkind normalization fuel handling ([#5047](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5047), [#5009](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5009)), improved environment fold operations ([#5066](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5066)), removed .vscode from repo ([#4186](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4186)), and opened GADT with-bounds work ([#5046](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5046))
- [Max Slater](https://github.com/TheNumbat) added 128-bit integer intrinsics ([#5025](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5025)) and BMI/BMI2 intrinsics with multiple return register support ([#5065](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5065))
- [James Rayman](https://github.com/jra4) re-enabled unboxed elements at module top-level with cross-module inlining fixes ([#5064](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5064)) and continues work on untagged int arrays ([#4779](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4779), [#4643](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4643), [#4936](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4936))
- [Zesen Qian](https://github.com/riaqn) implemented loose staticity checking ([#5054](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5054)), removed extension.escape ([#5055](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5055)), added skip mode hints ([#5053](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5053)), and opened transl_value_decl refactoring ([#5060](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5060))
- [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) removed code age relation join ([#5051](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5051)), improved chamelon Ctrl-C handling ([#5061](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5061)), and opened type rewriting interface work ([#5050](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5050))
- [Nathanaëlle Courant](https://github.com/Ekdohibs) refactored reaper code ([#5049](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5049), [#5038](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5038)) and continues type rewriting implementation ([#5043](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5043))
- [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) fixed classic mode approximations for mixed block support ([#5058](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5058))
- [Simon Spies](https://github.com/spiessimon) added C/OCaml interaction debugging tests ([#5062](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5062)) and continues DWARF/debugging improvements ([#4916](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4916), [#4961](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4961), [#4928](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4928))
- [Chris Casinghino](https://github.com/ccasin) reverted and re-applied unboxed module elements ([#5056](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5056), coordinating with [#5064](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5064)) and opened abstract kinds preparation ([#5070](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5070))
- [Andrei Odintsov](https://github.com/Forestryks) implemented manifest file support ([#4986](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4986))
- [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) removed boot directory ([#5067](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5067))
- [Vesa Karvonen](https://github.com/polytypic) fixed out-of-fibers test backtrace behavior ([#5042](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5042))
- [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) bumped magic numbers for 5.2.0minus-24 release ([#5048](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5048))
- [@BuzzYbis](https://github.com/BuzzYbis) fixed documentation typo in Tree pattern matching tutorial ([#5069](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5069))
- [@mshinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) opened typed ARM64 DSL work ([#5037](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5037))
- [@gretay-js](https://github.com/gretay-js) opened Cfg_dataflow refactoring ([#5045](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5045)) and ARM64 intrinsics work ([#5024](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5024))
- [@zackbach](https://github.com/zackbach) opened separability axis conversion work ([#5031](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5031))
- [@Dreian](https://github.com/Dreian) opened repr source syntax additions ([#5068](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5068))

summaries.brief_summary: Mixed module support, type system improvements, runtime optimizations, backend enhancements, and probes implementation
summaries.new_features_summary: Mixed modules, jkind API expansion, architecture constants, CFG optimizations, fiber error handling, GC profiling
summaries.new_features:
- **Mixed module support** enables unboxed elements at top-level of modules through `Module_mixed` representation with mixed block shapes, allowing modules to contain both values and unboxed primitives ([#4020](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4020))
- **Jkind expansion API** adds `format_expanded` function for Merlin to display fully-expanded jkinds on hover ([#5041](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5041))
- **Architecture compile-time constants** via `%arch_amd64` and `%arch_arm64` builtins plus `Sys.architecture` for runtime detection ([#4972](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4972))
- **Unoptimized probes implementation** for arm64 with `enabled_at_init` field on `Probe_is_enabled` primitive and `-probes-optimized`/`-no-probes-optimized` flags ([#5007](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5007))
- **CFG value propagation** extended to float values (`Const_float` and `Const_float32`) with terminator simplification improvements ([#4879](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4879), [#4807](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4807))
- **CFG reducibility checking** via `Cfg_reducibility` module to validate loop information trustworthiness ([#4920](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4920))
- **Fiber error handling** raises `Effect.Out_of_fibers` exception instead of `Out_of_memory` when mmap stack allocation fails ([#5021](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5021))
- **Fiber cache limit** via `-Xcache_stacks_per_class=` GC parameter to prevent unbounded memory growth ([#5017](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5017))
- **GC stat sampling** includes current minor words for more accurate `Gc.quick_stat` results in single-domain programs ([#5030](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5030))
- **Makefile cleanup targets** with `make clean` and `make distclean` preserving editor configs ([#5035](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5035))
- **Runtime metaprogramming extension** gates quotes, splices, and quotation evaluation ([#5012](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5012))
summaries.activity_summary: Active development across type system, backend optimizations, runtime improvements, and open PRs for SIMD and layouts
summaries.activity:
- **Newly opened PRs** include separability as scannable axis renaming pointerness ([#5031](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5031)), fuel optimization with linear consumption ([#5009](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5009)), AVX2 gather intrinsics support ([#5040](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5040)), 128-bit integer arithmetic intrinsics ([#5025](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5025)), staticity mode checking ([#5029](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5029)), immutable arrays of unboxed products ([#5026](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5026)), typed DSL for arm64 ([#5037](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5037)), and module mode hint system ([#5034](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5034))
- **Type system improvements** delivered through `Tof_jkind` for unboxed existentials and Tpolys by [Liam Stevenson](https://github.com/liam923) ([#4995](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4995)), v1 safety check optimization avoiding substitutions ([#5039](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5039)), and upstream PR 13866 with marking mechanism updates ([#5015](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5015))
- **Backend enhancements** include probes code generation refactoring by [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) ([#5011](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5011)), CFG profiling counters for instructions, blocks, and moves by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) ([#5027](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5027)), and CFG terminator simplification reinstated with reducibility check ([#4921](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4921))
- **Runtime optimizations** landed via marking loop optimization removing global access by [Nick Barnes](https://github.com/NickBarnes) ([#4997](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4997)), sweep loop global variable elimination ([#5022](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5022)), and multidomain testing without stack-checks by [Vesa Karvonen](https://github.com/polytypic) ([#5019](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5019))
- **Infrastructure updates** merged including metrics collection refactor for per-artifact tracking by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) ([#5003](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5003)), compiler profile data archiving ([#5004](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5004)), Dune version bump to 3.17.2 by [Sadiq Jaffer](https://github.com/sadiqj) ([#5000](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5000)), and Chamelon boot compiler compatibility by [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) ([#5020](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5020))
- **Active development** continues on .cmxs format optimization with consolidated imports ([#5014](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5014)), slambda splices integration ([#5023](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5023)), arm64 intrinsics for RDTSC and CRC32 ([#5024](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5024)), reaper consistency for apply ([#5038](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5038)), dump-dir race condition fix ([#5010](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5010)), and manifest files support ([#4986](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4986))
summaries.trends_summary: Focus on unboxed types, backend optimization, type system precision, and runtime performance
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Unboxed types maturation** shown through mixed modules at top-level ([#4020](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4020)), immutable arrays of unboxed products ([#5026](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5026)), and enhanced type system support for existentials ([#4995](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4995))
- **Backend optimization push** evidenced by CFG value propagation extensions ([#4879](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4879), [#4807](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4807)), reducibility checking ([#4920](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4920), [#4921](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4921)), probes implementation ([#5007](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5007), [#5011](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5011)), and multiple WIP peephole optimizations ([#5018](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5018), [#5016](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5016), [#5028](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5028), [#5032](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5032), [#5033](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5033))
- **Type system precision** advances through jkind inference improvements ([#5039](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5039), [#5009](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5009)), scannable axis development ([#5006](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5006), [#5031](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5031)), mode checking enhancements ([#5029](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5029), [#5034](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5034)), and upstream synchronization ([#5015](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5015))
- **Runtime performance focus** through GC micro-optimizations reducing global access ([#4997](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4997), [#5022](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5022)), fiber cache management ([#5017](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5017)), error handling improvements ([#5021](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5021)), and profiling accuracy ([#5030](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5030))
- **SIMD and intrinsics expansion** with AVX2 gather instructions ([#5040](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5040)), 128-bit arithmetic ([#5025](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5025)), architecture detection ([#4972](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4972)), and arm64 platform parity ([#5024](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5024), [#5037](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5037))
- **Developer experience improvements** via Merlin integration ([#5041](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5041)), build system enhancements ([#5035](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5035), [#4186](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4186)), metrics tracking ([#5003](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5003), [#5004](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5004)), and CI hardening ([#5019](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5019))
summaries.contributors_summary: 18 contributors delivered 25 merged PRs with extensive type system, backend, and runtime work
summaries.contributors:
- [@liam923](https://github.com/liam923) drove type system advances through `Tof_jkind` for existentials and Tpolys ([#4995](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/4995)), v1 safety check optimization ([#5039](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5039)), upstream PR downstreaming ([#5015](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5015)), jkind expansion API ([#5041](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5041)), and opened fuel optimization PR ([#5009](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/pull/5009))
