summaries.brief_summary: Runtime improvements for threading and GC control, mode system enhancements, and compiler bug fixes
summaries.new_features_summary: New GC tweak to disable SIGSEGV handler, phantom bindings support, improved mode error messages, and LLVM backend fixes
summaries.new_features:
- **GC debugging control** added via `Xenable_segv_handler=0` tweak to disable SIGSEGV handler for better coredump analysis during segfaults ([#4913](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4913))
- **Phantom bindings support** implemented in Flambda2 allowing debug information generation without keeping dead code alive, controlled via `-gdwarf-may-alter-codegen-experimental` flag ([#3937](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/3937))
- **Domain locking unification** merging backup thread and systhreads locks into single mechanism, enabling Python interop with multi-domain programs ([#4769](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4769))
- **Runtime4 TLS fix** for threads created via `caml_c_thread_register` ensuring proper thread-local storage initialization ([#4915](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4915))
- **LLVM backend** now implements `Dls_get` operation for domain-local storage access ([#4903](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4903))
- **Mode hint improvements** providing clearer error messages for allocation and regional mode errors with full hint chains ([#4917](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4917))
- **Regional mode printing** simplified to show "local to the parent region" consistently instead of special-cased "regional" ([#4918](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4918))
- **Compiler crash fix** for width checking in record types with crossing annotations preventing segfaults ([#4902](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4902))
- **Primitive simplification fix** resolving binding ordering bug when extra bindings were introduced during optimization ([#4923](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4923))
- **CI infrastructure** improved with proper commit message escaping to prevent shell injection ([#4907](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4907))
- **Build cleanup** removing unused `native/topeval.ml` file moving interface to bytecode-only location ([#4780](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4780))
summaries.activity_summary: Runtime threading improvements, mode system refinements, and ongoing work on preemption, name mangling, and parsing features
summaries.activity:
- **Preemption support** under development with 2500+ line draft PR affecting 62 files for concurrent execution control by [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) ([#4881](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4881))
- **Name mangling scheme** in progress with reversible mangling for full module path reconstruction and demangling implementations for LLVM, Linux kernel, and binutils by [Tim McGilchrist](https://github.com/tmcgilchrist) ([#4850](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4850))
- **Crossing syntax parsing** adding `mod <crossings>` support for per-value mode tracking with 1100+ line implementation by [Zack Eisbach](https://github.com/zackbach) ([#4781](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4781))
- **Mixed modules with non-values** allowing automatic reordering of module fields to support unboxed types across module boundaries by [James Rayman](https://github.com/jra4) ([#4020](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4020))
- **Effect primitive refactoring** to remove `Must_not_enter_gc` module by making `%resume` take continuation directly instead of unpacked fields by [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) ([#4901](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4901))
- **Backup thread locking improvements** extending `caml_locking_scheme` interface with better backup thread interactions for custom locking schemes by [Stephen Dolan](https://github.com/stedolan) ([#4914](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4914))
- **Quotation system fixes** addressing unification bugs in quote/splice handling for metaprogramming by [Leo White](https://github.com/lpw25) ([#4906](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4906), [#4911](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4911), [#4912](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4912))
- **Constructor quotation locks bug** fixing predef type checking to properly handle locally-defined constructors by [Zesen Qian](https://github.com/riaqn) ([#4910](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4910))
- **Frametable relocation optimization** proposing `.lrodata` section placement to reduce text section size and prevent linker failures under default code model by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) ([#4905](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4905))
- **CFG reducibility checking** and related terminator simplification improvements for backend optimization by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) ([#4920](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4920), [#4921](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4921), [#4807](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4807), [#4879](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4879))
- **Untagged int arrays** implementation adding `int8#`, `int16#`, and `int#` array support with proper tag selection and indexing by [James Rayman](https://github.com/jra4) ([#4643](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4643))
- **js_of_ocaml integration** comprehensive test suite and CI updates for JavaScript backend testing by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4753](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4753))
- **CI runner upgrades** enabling larger build machines for faster compilation and test execution by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4908](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4908))
- **LLVM backend flag control** adding `-no-llvm-backend` option for selective testing by [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) ([#4904](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4904))
- **Primitive list generation** tool discussion about auto-generating comprehensive primitive documentation by [James Rayman](https://github.com/jra4) ([#4812](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4812))
- **Debug information layouts** improving runtime type representation for flattened arrays by [Simon Spies](https://github.com/spiessimon) ([#4916](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4916))
- **Slambda IR development** introducing static evaluation phase between translation and lambda with trivial initial implementation by [Luke Maurer](https://github.com/lukemaurer) ([#4776](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4776))
- **Mode system refinements** including hints for containing types, global/aliased implications, and `Lambda.layout` usage by [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) ([#4919](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4919), [#4889](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4889), [#4582](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4582), [#4549](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4549))
- **Jkind subsumption test** reproducing cross-file bug for investigation by [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) ([#4922](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4922))
- **Ikind system prototype** implementing new subsumption and mode crossing algorithms behind `-extension ikinds` flag by [@julesjacobs](https://github.com/julesjacobs) ([#4675](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4675))
- **VERSION file cleanup** removing installation dependency to match upstream OCaml by [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) ([#4924](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4924))
- **Typeopt level preservation** fixing unintended type variable level changes affecting principal typing and nullability by [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) ([#4549](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4549))
- **Lex directory removal** cleaning up unused lexer code and dependent tests by [James Rayman](https://github.com/jra4) ([#4925](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4925))
summaries.trends_summary: Focus on runtime performance, type system refinements, and debugging infrastructure
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Runtime optimization** continues with threading model improvements, domain lock unification, and GC control enhancements targeting production deployment needs
- **Mode system maturation** progressing through improved error messages, hint chain completeness, and experimental ikind algorithms addressing polymorphic variants and GADTs
- **Debugging infrastructure** advancing with phantom bindings, improved debug layouts, reversible name mangling, and frametable optimization for large codebases
- **Backend diversification** expanding with LLVM backend fixes, js_of_ocaml integration testing, and CFG optimization improvements
- **Type system power** growing through crossing syntax, mixed modules, metaprogramming quotations, and untagged array support
- **Code quality initiatives** including cleanup of unused code, better CI infrastructure, and comprehensive test coverage
summaries.contributors_summary: Runtime work by Stephen Dolan and Aspen Smith, mode system by Zesen Qian, compiler fixes by Vincent Laviron and Chris Casinghino
summaries.contributors:
- [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) fixed primitive simplification binding ordering bug ([#4923](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4923)) and reviewed phantom bindings implementation with [Pierre Chambart](https://github.com/chambart)
- [Zesen Qian](https://github.com/riaqn) improved mode error messages with allocation hints ([#4917](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4917)), simplified regional printing ([#4918](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4918)), and fixed constructor quotation locks bug ([#4910](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4910)) with review feedback from [Richard Eisenberg](https://github.com/goldfirere)
- [Stephen Dolan](https://github.com/stedolan) unified domain locking mechanism ([#4769](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4769)), added GC SIGSEGV handler control ([#4913](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4913)), and extended locking scheme interface ([#4914](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4914)) with reviews from [Nick Barnes](https://github.com/NickBarnes)
- [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) fixed runtime4 TLS initialization ([#4915](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4915)), continued preemption implementation ([#4881](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4881)), refactored effect primitives ([#4901](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4901)), and added jkind subsumption test ([#4922](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4922))
- [James Rayman](https://github.com/jra4) cleaned up native topeval ([#4780](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4780)), fixed CI escaping ([#4907](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4907)), removed lex directory ([#4925](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4925)), and continued work on mixed modules ([#4020](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4020)), untagged arrays ([#4643](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4643)), and primitive listing ([#4812](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4812))
- [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) implemented LLVM `Dls_get` operation ([#4903](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4903)) and proposed backend flag control ([#4904](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4904))
- [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) developed CFG reducibility checking ([#4920](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4920)) and terminator simplification improvements ([#4921](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4921), [#4807](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4807), [#4879](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4879))
- [Chris Casinghino](https://github.com/ccasin) fixed width checking compiler crash ([#4902](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4902)) and reviewed primitive listing tool
- [Leo White](https://github.com/lpw25) fixed quotation unification bugs ([#4906](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4906), [#4911](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4911), [#4912](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4912)) with feedback from [Zesen Qian](https://github.com/riaqn)
- [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) proposed frametable `.lrodata` optimization ([#4905](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4905)) with input from [@NicolasT](https://github.com/NicolasT)
- [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) advanced js_of_ocaml testing ([#4753](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4753)) and CI runner upgrades ([#4908](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4908))
- [Tim McGilchrist](https://github.com/tmcgilchrist) continued reversible name mangling implementation ([#4850](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4850))
- [Zack Eisbach](https://github.com/zackbach) developed crossing syntax parsing ([#4781](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4781)) with reviews from [@mdelvecchio-jsc](https://github.com/mdelvecchio-jsc)
- [Simon Spies](https://github.com/spiessimon) improved debug information layouts ([#4916](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4916))
- [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) proposed VERSION file removal ([#4924](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4924)) and continued mode system work ([#4919](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4919), [#4889](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4889), [#4582](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4582), [#4549](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4549))
- [@julesjacobs](https://github.com/julesjacobs) prototyped ikind system ([#4675](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4675))
- [@lukemaurer](https://github.com/lukemaurer) introduced slambda IR ([#4776](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4776)) with review from [Chris Casinghino](https://github.com/ccasin)

summaries.brief_summary: Metaprogramming quotation fixes, type system improvements, and compiler debugger enhancements merged this week
summaries.new_features_summary: Quotation API additions, bits8/bits16 kinds without extension, improved debugger location info, and build path loading fix
summaries.new_features:
- New **quotation API functions** `Code.Closed.to_exp` and `Code.Closed.print` added to `CamlinternalQuote` module for converting closed code to expressions and formatted printing ([#4896](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4896))
- **bits8 and bits16 kinds** now allowed without requiring the `small_numbers` extension, improving library integration while maintaining upstream compatibility ([#4898](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4898))
- Improved **location information in pattern matching** for better debugger stepping behavior and source code position reporting ([#4884](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4884))
- Fixed **loading paths from paths file** bug in `load_path.ml` where variable shadowing caused incorrect path resolution for `-I-paths` flag ([#4878](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4878))
- Enhanced **debugger register handling** in `Name_for_debugger` operations with proper register substitution and unknown location handling ([#4880](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4880))
- **Shrink-wrapping testing** now enabled in CI through new option to `regalloc.exe` tool for inserting prologues ([#4892](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4892))
- Fixed **over-expunged toplevel** by removing unboxed types (`Float_u`, `Iarray`, `Int32_u`, `Int64_u`, `Nativeint_u`) not in compatible Stdlib ([#4877](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4877))
- Documentation typo fixes in unboxed types markdown: corrected `int16x2#` to `int16x8#` and grammar improvements ([#4883](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4883))
summaries.activity_summary: Metaprogramming work and Flambda2 optimizations dominate activity with 10 new PRs opened and ongoing work on modes and effects
summaries.activity:
- **New PRs opened** this week include continuation handling improvements by [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) ([#4901](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4901)), metaprogramming mdx fixes by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) ([#4900](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4900), [#4899](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4899)), Unix local/read annotations by [Vesa Karvonen](https://github.com/polytypic) ([#4830](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4830)), preemption support ([#4881](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4881)), CFG value propagation for floats by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) ([#4879](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4879)), extended CFG terminator simplification ([#4807](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4807)), and modes work including global/aliased implications by [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) ([#4889](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4889)), mode variable conversion ([#4792](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4792)), exception crossing improvements ([#4891](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4891)), and external array renaming ([#4890](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4890))
- **Metaprogramming infrastructure** advanced with quotation evaluation fixes merged by [Jack Rickard](https://github.com/Skepfyr) addressing exception handling and primitive addresses ([#4896](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4896)), double-linking prevention for eval support files by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) ([#4895](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4895)), and ongoing work on Camlinternaleval dependencies ([#4899](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4899), [#4900](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4900)) after closing superseded work ([#4894](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4894))
- **Flambda2 optimization work** delivered n-way join analysis exposure by [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) ([#4821](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4821)), datalog Virtual_machine.iterator cleanup ([#4897](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4897)), and reverted static constant sharing due to backtrace issues ([#4893](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4893)) though it was briefly merged ([#4800](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4800))
- **Backend and type system** improvements included CFG terminator simplification revert due to loop information issues by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) ([#4885](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4885)), private `Reg.t` refactoring in progress by [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) ([#4888](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4888)), bits8/bits16 kinds compatibility by [Nailen Matschke](https://github.com/nmatschke) ([#4898](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4898)), and path loading fix by [Andrei Odintsov](https://github.com/Forestryks) ([#4878](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4878))
- **Infrastructure and tooling** updates included GDB memsearch utility improvements by [Nick Barnes](https://github.com/NickBarnes) ([#4886](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4886)), const qualifiers for caml_startup functions ([#4882](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4882)), cfg_tool.exe development for debugging CFG issues ([#4596](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4596)), config variables printing work ([#4873](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4873)), toplevel expunging fix by [David Allsopp](https://github.com/dra27) ([#4877](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4877)), and shrink-wrapping CI testing ([#4892](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4892))
- **Ongoing runtime and effects work** includes domain lock unification by [Stephen Dolan](https://github.com/stedolan) ([#4769](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4769)), preemption implementation by [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) ([#4881](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4881)), continuation handling improvements ([#4901](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4901)), and GC check skipping for external arrays ([#4622](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4622))
summaries.trends_summary: Focus on metaprogramming stability, type system modes refinement, and compiler debugging infrastructure improvements
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Metaprogramming maturation** continues with focus on quotation evaluation correctness, mdx integration, and linking infrastructure through multiple PRs addressing edge cases in the evaluation system ([#4896](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4896), [#4895](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4895), [#4899](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4899), [#4900](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4900))
- **Modes system refinement** shows ongoing work on soundness and usability with PRs addressing global/aliased relationships, mode variable serialization, and exception crossing semantics ([#4889](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4889), [#4792](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4792), [#4891](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4891))
- **Debugger and location information** receiving attention with pattern matching location improvements and register handling enhancements for better debugging experience ([#4884](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4884), [#4880](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4880), [#4886](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4886))
- **Backend optimization caution** demonstrated by multiple reverts of optimization PRs when they cause issues with backtraces or loop analysis, showing preference for correctness over performance gains ([#4893](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4893), [#4885](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4885))
- **Effects system development** progressing with continuation handling refactoring and preemption support work alongside domain lock unification for cleaner runtime threading ([#4901](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4901), [#4881](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4881), [#4769](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4769))
- **Upstream compatibility** remains priority with work on allowing erasable features like bits8/bits16 kinds without requiring extensions and fixing toplevel to match compatible Stdlib ([#4898](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4898), [#4877](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4877))
summaries.contributors_summary: 13 contributors active with code contributions from Shinwell, Clément, Clerc, Rickard, and others plus reviews from Kalinichenko, White
summaries.contributors:
- [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) worked on metaprogramming infrastructure including preventing double-linking of eval support files ([#4895](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4895)), improved debugger location information in pattern matching ([#4884](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4884)), enhanced Name_for_debugger register handling ([#4880](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4880)), and opened PRs for Camlinternaleval mdx fixes ([#4899](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4899), [#4900](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4900))
- [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) delivered Flambda2 improvements by removing Virtual_machine.iterator ([#4897](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4897)) and exposing join analysis from n-way join ([#4821](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4821))
- [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) merged shrink-wrapping CI testing ([#4892](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4892)), reverted CFG terminator simplification due to loop issues ([#4885](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4885)), and has ongoing work on CFG value propagation ([#4879](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4879), [#4807](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4807)) and cfg_tool.exe ([#4596](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4596))
- [Jack Rickard](https://github.com/Skepfyr) implemented quotation evaluation fixes addressing exception handling and primitive address issues ([#4896](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4896)) with review from [Leo White](https://github.com/lpw25)
- [Nailen Matschke](https://github.com/nmatschke) enabled bits8/bits16 kinds without small_numbers extension for better library integration ([#4898](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4898)) with feedback from [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js)
- [Andrei Odintsov](https://github.com/Forestryks) fixed path loading bug in load_path.ml affecting -I-paths flag ([#4878](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4878))
- [@tkoukpari](https://github.com/tkoukpari) corrected documentation typos in unboxed types markdown ([#4883](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4883))
- [David Allsopp](https://github.com/dra27) fixed over-expunged toplevel by removing unboxed types not in compatible Stdlib ([#4877](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4877))
- [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) worked on static constant sharing which was initially merged ([#4800](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4800)) with review from [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell)
- [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) reverted static constant sharing due to test failures and backtrace issues ([#4893](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4893)) and is working on making Reg.t private ([#4888](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4888)) with extensive review from [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc)
- [Nick Barnes](https://github.com/NickBarnes) improved GDB memsearch utility robustness ([#4886](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4886)) and has open work on const qualifiers for caml_startup ([#4882](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4882))
- [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) opened PRs for preemption support ([#4881](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4881)) and continuation handling improvements ([#4901](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4901))
- [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) provided reviews on multiple PRs ([#4896](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4896), [#4898](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4898), [#4884](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4884)) and has ongoing work on modes including global/aliased implications ([#4889](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4889)), exception crossing ([#4891](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4891)), and external arrays ([#4890](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4890), [#4622](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4622))
- [Zesen Qian](https://github.com/riaqn) has ongoing work on mode conversion to constants ([#4792](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4792)) and provided review feedback on global/aliased implications ([#4889](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4889))
- [Vesa Karvonen](https://github.com/polytypic) opened PR for Unix local/read parameter annotations ([#4830](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4830)) under discussion
- [Stephen Dolan](https://github.com/stedolan) has ongoing work on domain lock unification ([#4769](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4769)) with review from [Nick Barnes](https://github.com/NickBarnes)

summaries.brief_summary: Runtime quotations and js_of_ocaml integration landed alongside DWARF debugging improvements and block indices moving to stable
summaries.new_features_summary: Runtime metaprogramming with quotations, full js_of_ocaml integration, block indices stable, DWARF debugging improvements
summaries.new_features:
- **Runtime quotations and metaprogramming** system with new `<[` `]>` quotation syntax and `$` splicing operator for runtime code generation and evaluation, including stage tracking in the type system and AST representation in CamlInternalQuote module by [Andrej Ivašković](https://github.com/Dreian), [Jack Rickard](https://github.com/Skepfyr), and [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) ([#4395](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4395), [#4852](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4852), [#4864](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4864), [#4874](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4874), [#4855](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4855), [#4856](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4856))
- **Full js_of_ocaml compiler** integration imported into oxcaml with JSIR mode for JavaScript compilation and complete backend support by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) and [Leo Lee](https://github.com/smjleo) ([#4730](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4730), [#4737](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4737), [#4739](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4739), [#4743](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4743))
- **Block indices moved to stable** production-ready status with new `%unsafe_get_ptr` and `%unsafe_set_ptr` primitives, improved flattened float field handling with unboxed types, and safety constraint disallowing block indices to `[@atomic]` fields by [Ryan Tjoa](https://github.com/rtjoa) and [Chris Casinghino](https://github.com/ccasin) ([#4827](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4827), [#4824](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4824), [#4826](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4826), [#4828](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4828))
- **CFG terminator simplification** improves compilation of for loops by eliminating redundant jumps through rewriting unconditional jumps to conditional jumps, saving one comparison in simple loops by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) ([#4772](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4772))
- **Lambda layout specialization** enhancement uses externality information to avoid unnecessary `caml_modify` calls in specialized code through more precise GC-ignorability analysis by [Jakub Bachurski](https://github.com/jbachurski) and [Ryan Tjoa](https://github.com/rtjoa) ([#4853](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4853))
- **Polymorphic variants with-bounds** restored with performance fixes addressing pathological fuel algorithm cases and early termination optimization for mode-crossing by [Liam Stevenson](https://github.com/liam923) and [Richard Eisenberg](https://github.com/goldfirere) ([#4847](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4847))
- **New `-gdwarf-may-alter-codegen-experimental` flag** enables experimental DWARF debugging features by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) ([#4871](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4871))
- **Backend parameterization** refactoring enables adding new backends without code duplication through optcomp parameterization on backend implementation and asmlink split into three files by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4825](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4825), [#4838](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4838))
- Fixed **allocation site information** for inlined closures to correct debuginfo showing in OCaml backtraces and Memtrace by [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) ([#4842](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4842), fixes [#4831](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4831))
- Fixed **Multicore.spawn soundness** issue by requiring resource argument to be `contended` and annotating as `once` for flexibility by [Vesa Karvonen](https://github.com/polytypic) ([#4875](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4875))
- Fixed **jkind normalization** soundness bug with modalities by tracking modalities when skipping previously seen types by [Liam Stevenson](https://github.com/liam923) ([#4777](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4777))
- Fixed **over-expunged toplevel** by removing Float_u, Iarray, IarrayLabels, Int32_u, Int64_u, Nativeint_u from toplevel as these aren't in compatible Stdlib, spotted during ICFP tutorial by [David Allsopp](https://github.com/dra27) ([#4877](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4877))
- Fixed **zero_alloc warning scope** so top-level `[@@@warning "-199"]` works correctly by saving scope where attribute is encountered by [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) ([#4819](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4819))
- Fixed **atomic fields in mixed blocks** miscompilation by rejecting unsupported cases where atomic fields get wrong field index by [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) ([#4868](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4868))
- Fixed **bytecode differentiation** between Bytes.get and String.get needed by js_of_ocaml for different representations by [Jérôme Vouillon](https://github.com/vouillon) ([#4782](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4782))
- Fixed **spill placement** with Name_for_debugger to ensure spilled registers inherit debug names correctly by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) ([#4837](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4837))
- Fixed **ocaml-probes usability** by emitting dummy probe notes when `[%probe_is_enabled name]` appears without corresponding `[%probe name]` to avoid linking errors by [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) ([#4834](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4834))
- **Register availability analysis** improvements with multiple bug fixes in DWARF tracking for better debug information generation by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) and [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) ([#4835](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4835), [#4870](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4870))
- **Mode system refactoring** simplifies adding new mode axes with net code reduction (252 additions, 501 deletions) by [Zesen Qian](https://github.com/riaqn) ([#4790](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4790))
- **CI performance improvements** including faster ocamlformat workflow saving ~15 seconds per job with setup-ocaml optimization and reduced macOS CI load by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4857](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4857), [#4858](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4858), [#4859](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4859))
- **AGENTS.md documentation** moves Claude instructions to separate file for better organization of AI-assisted development by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4849](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4849))
- **JSIR documentation** added covering JavaScript IR quirks by [Leo Lee](https://github.com/smjleo) ([#4743](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4743))
- **DWARF test filtering** with README and identifier number filtering for stable diffs by [Simon Spies](https://github.com/spiessimon) ([#4829](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4829))
- **Type path printing** improvement penalizes hash types in error messages so users see `f64` instead of `float#` by [Nailen Matschke](https://github.com/nmatschke) ([#4832](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4832))
summaries.activity_summary: 23 new PRs opened including preemption, staticity mode axis, and n-way join analysis, plus metaprogramming and JavaScript backend work completed
summaries.activity:
- Twenty-three **new PRs opened** this week representing future work: preemption by [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) ([#4881](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4881)), staticity mode axis by [Zesen Qian](https://github.com/riaqn) ([#4799](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4799)), n-way join analysis exposure by [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) ([#4821](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4821)), extended CFG terminator simplification by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) ([#4807](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4807)), Unix params annotations by [Vesa Karvonen](https://github.com/polytypic) ([#4830](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4830)), `-quiet` flag for ocamldebug by [Jakub Bachurski](https://github.com/jbachurski) ([#4869](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4869)), print all config variables by [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) ([#4873](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4873)), workflow promote failed diffs by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) ([#4808](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4808)), reversible name mangling by [Tim McGilchrist](https://github.com/tmcgilchrist) ([#4850](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4850)), Classic mode fallback inlining switch-off by [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) ([#4845](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4845)), CI warning addition by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4867](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4867)), ocamlj testing and CI by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4753](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4753)), compiler and driver changes for js_of_ocaml by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4791](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4791)), automatic module field reordering for mixed modules by [James Rayman](https://github.com/jra4) ([#4020](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4020)), flambda2 test tools building by [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) ([#4851](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4851)), stdlib.mli stateless annotations by [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) ([#4839](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4839)), slambda with trivial transl and eval by [Luke Maurer](https://github.com/lukemaurer) ([#4776](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4776)), levels for variable sorting by [Andrej Ivašković](https://github.com/Dreian) ([#4785](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4785)), JSIR naked int32 array initialization optimization by [Leo Lee](https://github.com/smjleo) ([#4741](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4741)), parsing crossings support by [Zack Eisbach](https://github.com/zackbach) ([#4781](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4781)), mode to constant conversion for cmi by [Zesen Qian](https://github.com/riaqn) ([#4792](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4792)), prototype ikind system by [@julesjacobs](https://github.com/julesjacobs) ([#4675](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4675)), and metrics upload artifacts exploration by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4848](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4848))
- **Metaprogramming infrastructure** delivered through runtime quotations with new `<[` `]>` syntax and `$` splicing by [Andrej Ivašković](https://github.com/Dreian) merging foundational PR with 9,312 additions ([#4395](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4395)), parse tree quotation nodes by [Andrej Ivašković](https://github.com/Dreian) ([#4852](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4852)), backend driver support by [Jack Rickard](https://github.com/Skepfyr) and [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) ([#4864](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4864)), quotation evaluation by [Jack Rickard](https://github.com/Skepfyr) ([#4874](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4874)), and ocaml-jit integration by [Jack Rickard](https://github.com/Skepfyr) ([#4855](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4855), [#4856](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4856))
- **JavaScript backend maturation** through complete js_of_ocaml compiler import with 303,437 additions by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4730](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4730)), JSIR symbol imports compilation unit by [Leo Lee](https://github.com/smjleo) ([#4737](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4737)), bytecode primitives in JSIR mode by [Leo Lee](https://github.com/smjleo) ([#4739](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4739)), and JSIR documentation by [Leo Lee](https://github.com/smjleo) ([#4743](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4743))
- **DWARF debugging improvements** encompassing register availability analysis fixes by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) and [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) ([#4835](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4835), [#4870](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4870)), experimental codegen flag by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) ([#4871](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4871)), Alias binding substitution restriction by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) ([#4872](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4872)), inlined frames for specialised code by [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) fixing [#4831](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4831) ([#4842](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4842)), spill placement fixes by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) ([#4837](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4837)), Name_for_debugger at tailrec_entry by [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) ([#4863](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4863)), dummy probe notes by [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) ([#4834](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4834)), and test identifier filtering by [Simon Spies](https://github.com/spiessimon) ([#4829](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4829))
- **Type system and unboxed types** work including block indices moving to stable by [Ryan Tjoa](https://github.com/rtjoa) ([#4827](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4827)), atomic fields disallowance by [Ryan Tjoa](https://github.com/rtjoa) ([#4824](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4824)), flattened float fields with unboxed types by [Ryan Tjoa](https://github.com/rtjoa) ([#4826](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4826)), unsafe pointer primitives by [Ryan Tjoa](https://github.com/rtjoa) ([#4828](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4828)), Lambda layouts externality use by [Jakub Bachurski](https://github.com/jbachurski) and [Ryan Tjoa](https://github.com/rtjoa) ([#4853](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4853)), polymorphic variants with-bounds restoration by [Liam Stevenson](https://github.com/liam923) and [Richard Eisenberg](https://github.com/goldfirere) ([#4847](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4847)), jkind normalization fix by [Liam Stevenson](https://github.com/liam923) ([#4777](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4777)), mode system refactoring by [Zesen Qian](https://github.com/riaqn) ([#4790](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4790)), atomic fields in mixed blocks forbidding by [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) ([#4868](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4868)), and Multicore.spawn soundness fix by [Vesa Karvonen](https://github.com/polytypic) ([#4875](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4875))
- **Backend and compilation** improvements with CFG terminator simplification by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) ([#4772](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4772)), optcomp backend parameterization by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4825](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4825)), asmlink file splitting by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4838](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4838)), location-based Reg.t containers by [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) ([#4865](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4865)), Flambda nullable kinds printer by [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) ([#4823](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4823)), and Bytes.get/String.get bytecode differentiation by [Jérôme Vouillon](https://github.com/vouillon) ([#4782](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4782))
- **CI and build system** enhancements through dependency simplification by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4833](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4833)), Dune max version check removal by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) ([#4866](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4866)), ocamlformat speedups by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4857](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4857)), further CI acceleration by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4858](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4858)), macOS CI load reduction by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4859](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4859)), workflow conditional syntax fixing by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4860](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4860)), diff application workflow by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) ([#4810](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4810)), Nix flake github-actions by [George Shammas](https://github.com/georgyo) ([#4711](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4711)), Dune version update in default.nix by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4846](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4846)), and metrics script fix by [@spiessimon](https://github.com/spiessiom) merged as [#4844](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4844)
- **Tooling and quality** improvements with AGENTS.md documentation by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4849](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4849)), type path printing penalization by [Nailen Matschke](https://github.com/nmatschke) ([#4832](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4832)), zero_alloc warning scope fix by [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) ([#4819](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4819)), version bump to 5.2.0minus-22 by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) ([#4876](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4876)), over-expunged toplevel fix by [David Allsopp](https://github.com/dra27) ([#4877](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4877)), and code formatting by [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) ([#4843](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4843), [#4836](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4836))
summaries.discussions_summary: For loop optimization discussion, runtime quotations extensive review, register availability analysis details, backend parameterization design
summaries.notable_discussions:
- For loop optimization **approaches debated** in [#4752](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4752) with [Akshat](https://github.com/Auth0x78) proposing lambda simplification approach while [Guillaume Bury](https://github.com/Gbury) noted simplif happens before inlining, related to implementation PRs by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) ([#4772](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4772), [#4807](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4807))
- **Wrong allocation site information** for inlined closures reported by [Stephen Dolan](https://github.com/stedolan) in [#4831](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4831) about missing inlined frames affecting OCaml backtraces and Memtrace accuracy, fixed by [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) ([#4842](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4842))
- **Runtime quotations** extensive review of [#4395](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4395) with 65+ comments from [Zesen Qian](https://github.com/riaqn) and [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) discussing stage tracking, type system integration, GADT support, and uniqueness analysis across 9,312 additions in 72 files
- **Register availability analysis** detailed technical review of [#4835](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4835) with 25+ comments from [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) addressing Unreachable handling, register comparisons, machtype comparisons, and debug info concerns
- **Backend parameterization** design discussions in [#4825](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4825) about interface design for modular backends enabling js_of_ocaml integration
- **Polymorphic variants performance** concerns in [#4847](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4847) about fuel algorithm with [Richard Eisenberg](https://github.com/goldfirere) approval requesting monitoring to avoid repeating June performance issues
summaries.trends_summary: Metaprogramming infrastructure build-out, JavaScript backend maturation, DWARF debugging excellence, type system evolution, CI modernization
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Metaprogramming infrastructure** build-out with runtime quotations introducing `<[` `]>` syntax and `$` splicing, ocaml-jit integration for JIT compilation, stage tracking in type system, and foundation for staged computation ([#4395](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4395), [#4852](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4852), [#4864](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4864), [#4874](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4874), [#4855](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4855), [#4856](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4856))
- **JavaScript backend maturation** with full js_of_ocaml integration importing 300K+ lines of code, JSIR mode development, and making ocamlj a fully-featured compiler ([#4730](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4730), [#4737](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4737), [#4739](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4739), [#4743](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4743), [#4791](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4791), [#4753](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4753))
- **DWARF debugging excellence** through continuous improvements to debugging experience including register availability analysis refinement, better debuginfo for inlined code, experimental flags for testing new features, with consistent collaboration between [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) and [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) ([#4835](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4835), [#4870](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4870), [#4871](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4871), [#4872](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4872), [#4837](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4837), [#4863](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4863), [#4842](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4842), [#4834](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4834), [#4829](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4829))
- **Type system evolution** with unboxed types moving to production through block indices stabilization, mode system refactoring for extensibility, jkind normalization fixes, and modality tracking improvements ([#4827](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4827), [#4824](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4824), [#4826](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4826), [#4828](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4828), [#4790](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4790), [#4777](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4777))
- **CI and build infrastructure modernization** through setup-ocaml adoption, speed optimizations saving 15+ seconds per job, Nix flake integration, and automated diff promotion workflows ([#4857](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4857), [#4858](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4858), [#4859](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4859), [#4711](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4711), [#4810](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4810))
- **Backend modularity** refactoring for parameterized backends, splitting monolithic files like asmlink into three files, and preparing for multiple target architectures ([#4825](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4825), [#4838](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4838))
summaries.contributors_summary: 22 active contributors with Jacob Van Buren leading CI improvements, Mark Shinwell on DWARF debugging, Andrej Ivašković on metaprogramming
summaries.contributors:
- [Jacob Van Buren](https://github.com/jvanburen) merged 15 PRs including js_of_ocaml integration ([#4730](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4730)), backend parameterization ([#4825](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4825), [#4838](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4838)), CI improvements ([#4833](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4833), [#4857](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4857), [#4858](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4858), [#4859](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4859), [#4860](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4860)), documentation ([#4849](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4849)), and code formatting ([#4836](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4836), [#4843](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4843)), plus opened PRs for ocamlj testing ([#4753](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4753)), compiler changes ([#4791](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4791)), CI warnings ([#4867](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4867)), and metrics ([#4848](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4848))
- [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) merged 7 PRs for DWARF debugging ([#4871](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4871), [#4872](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4872), [#4870](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4870), [#4837](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4837)), metaprogramming co-authorship ([#4864](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4864)), version bump ([#4876](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4876)), and provided extensive reviews on runtime quotations ([#4395](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4395)), register availability ([#4835](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4835)), and backend parameterization ([#4825](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4825))

- [Jack Rickard](https://github.com/Skepfyr) merged 3 PRs for quotation evaluation ([#4874](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4874)), ocaml-jit integration ([#4855](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4855), [#4856](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4856)), and metaprogramming backend driver ([#4864](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4864)), plus provided reviews on quotation infrastructure
- [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) merged 4 PRs for register availability co-authorship ([#4835](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4835)), tailrec_entry debugging ([#4863](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4863)), dummy probe notes ([#4834](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4834)), zero_alloc warning fix ([#4819](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4819)), provided detailed 25+ comment review on register availability analysis ([#4835](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4835)), and opened PR for config variables printing ([#4873](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4873))
- [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) merged 3 PRs for CFG terminator simplification ([#4772](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4772)), diff application workflow ([#4810](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4810)), Dune version check removal ([#4866](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4866)), plus opened PRs for extended terminator simplification ([#4807](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4807)) and workflow promotion ([#4808](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4808))
- [Ryan Tjoa](https://github.com/rtjoa) merged 4 PRs for block indices stabilization ([#4827](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4827)), atomic fields disallowance ([#4824](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4824)), unsafe pointer primitives ([#4828](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4828)), and flattened float fields ([#4826](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4826)), plus contributed to Lambda layout specialization ([#4853](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4853))
- [Liam Stevenson](https://github.com/liam923) merged 2 PRs for polymorphic variants with-bounds restoration ([#4847](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4847)) and jkind normalization fix ([#4777](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4777))
- [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) merged PR fixing allocation site debuginfo for inlined closures ([#4842](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4842)) resolving issue [#4831](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4831), and opened PR for Classic mode inlining changes ([#4845](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4845))

- [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) merged PR forbidding atomic fields in mixed blocks ([#4868](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4868)) and opened draft PR for preemption ([#4881](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4881))
- [@jbachurski](https://github.com/jbachurski) merged PR for Lambda layout specialization with externality information ([#4853](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4853)) and opened PR for ocamldebug `-quiet` flag ([#4869](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4869))
- [@polytypic](https://github.com/polytypic) merged PR fixing Multicore.spawn soundness ([#4875](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4875)) and opened PR for Unix params annotations ([#4830](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4830))

- [@bclement-ocp](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) merged 2 PRs for location-based Reg.t containers ([#4865](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4865)) and Flambda nullable kinds printer ([#4823](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4823)), plus opened PRs for n-way join analysis ([#4821](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4821)) and flambda2 test tools ([#4851](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4851))

- [@nmatschke](https://github.com/nmatschke) merged PR penalizing hash types in type path printing ([#4832](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4832))
- [@spiessimon](https://github.com/spiessimon) merged PR for DWARF test identifier filtering ([#4829](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4829)) and authored metrics script fix ([#4844](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4844))
- [@georgyo](https://github.com/georgyo) merged PR for Nix flake github-actions ([#4711](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4711))
- [@goldfirere](https://github.com/goldfirere) co-authored and reviewed polymorphic variants with-bounds ([#4847](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4847))
- [@ccasin](https://github.com/ccasin) reviewed multiple unboxed types PRs ([#4826](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4826), [#4828](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4828), [#4868](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4868))
- [@lpw25](https://github.com/lpw25) reviewed unboxed types work ([#4826](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4826))
